titles: A proclamation anent the rendezvouses of the militia, for the year 1683
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty,
notes: At end of text: Given under our signet, at Edinburgh, the twenty third day of March, one thousand six hundred eighty and three: and of Our Reign, the thirtieth fifth year.
Steele notation: Arms 232  Faith; giment Pre-.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
keywords: Scotland --  Militia --  Mobilization --  Early works to 1800.
